page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF RICHARD
page.content: On Tuesdays I am woken by my Dad at {05 15}when he brings me a cup of tea.Then I quickly get dressed and get my{swimming}kit together.At{05 40}we leave the house and pick Elizabeth up in the car (she is a friend who also swims competitively with our club). When we arrive at the baths at{06 00 I start training swimming many lengths of the pool,using different strokes and techniques. Afterwards we go home and have our breakfast.At{08 30}I go to{school. First I meet my friends on the playground.After registration we have assembly.We then work until{12 00 having had a short mid-morning break of 15 minutes.After a school dinner break lessons resume from{13 20}until {15 45.After school}I rush home to go swimming again.When I get home I eat tea,cycle or watch T.V.before bed.
